title: Hot Chick Reveals Secrets About Mens' Grooming & Hygiene
description:
To listen to more episodes of the Inner Confidence Podcast, visit the links below:
Website: https://innerconfidence.com/podcast/
iTunes:https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/inner-confidence-podcast/id986699444 
Spotify: https://open.spotify.com/show/2zkWuTnt7whvnR6CO6oNPV
RSS: https://innerconfidence.com/series/leverage-podcast/feed/

And if you're interested in learning more about my coaching services and connecting with me, check out these links:
LinkTree: https://linktr.ee/Robbiekramer
Main Site: https://innerconfidence.com/
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/robbie_kramer/
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@robbie.kramer
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/innerconfidence

Thank you for tuning in, and I look forward to helping you build your inner confidence and achieve success!

Join us : https://innerconfidence.com/leverage/
Book a call with me : https://start.innerconfidence.com/video1


#personaldevelopment #selfimprovement #innerconfidence #innerconfidencepodcast #podcast #coaching #success #motivation #inspiration #mindset #datingcoach #relationshipgoals #confidencecoach #selfimprovement #successfulmen
caption: false

channel_info.title: Robbie Kramer
channel_info.description:
I'm Robbie Kramer 🎙Host of The Inner Confidence Podcast & Founder of Inner Confidence, Inc.

I lived an exhilarating single life filled with adventures and lessons, and ultimately achieved what I had always aspired to – finding an amazing, feminine, and loving wife. 

I believe my experiences provide a rare balance of wild freedom and committed love, equipping me with the insights to help you navigate the complexities of dating and relationships in today's world. Let me guide you to embrace your desires, improve your social prowess, and ultimately attract the partner who aligns with your highest aspirations.

You won’t find any fluffy, new-age, or cringy stuff here, just tested, proven and actionable advice that yields results.

Apply to join our exclusive Inner Confidence Community of ambitious men who are actively working together to achieve their goals faster   ► https://innerconfidence.com/community

You can email me at robbie@innerconfidence.com with any questions or comments.

transcription: {"text": "So, in my fashion guide I explained some of the stuff, like grooming and hygiene and what not and how long your beard should be. It's really only stubble or scruff. Anything more than scruff I think is heading into Zach Galifianakis territory, it's a little too much. Nails are important, I noticed yesterday that Robbie had dirty nails, he never has dirty nails, as soon as he had dirty nails I noticed it and I asked. Hair, like don't let it, don't let this stuff get out of control, like you always have to keep this nice and trimmed and it might require you to do it in between haircuts, that's the problem. Most guys only get that done at each of their haircuts and then it grows out and it's all like nasty looking in the in between. So there's that. I brush, I don't know about you, but I brush my teeth like three times a day. If I ate something and I feel like not fresh after it or before I go out, always in the morning obviously, sometimes four times a day. I always notice if he's wearing a nice cologne that I like and if he's generally like well put together, I'll always pick up on that and that makes me think that he's a put together person, that he pays attention to stuff like that, small details, I might even comment on it. If he has really nice white teeth, that's hot. If he has B.O., I will for sure notice and when you have B.O., you can't always smell it on yourself. So if you're one of those guys who doesn't wear deodorant, make sure you're actually a smell-less guy who doesn't need deodorant, which they do exist, but I know some peeps who might end up watching this video who have been stinky a few times, not gonna name names.
